title: I am looking for the article in 5/2/10 paper about hiring people with asbergers. Could you forward me the article? Thanks
text:
The story you are referring to was from the McClatchy Newspapers wire
service. While we publish the material in print, our contract
agreement with the wire service does not allow us to publish the
material online. Copies of the Sunday newspaper are still available at
the front desk of the newspaper offices, and from a vending machine
near the front entrance.
